column1: #text=Last week I flew on an airplane to visit my aunt .
#text=First I made sure I packed everything I would need in my suitcase and had a friend drive me to the airport .
#text=I checked in at the airline desk and gave them my suitcase to load onto the plane .
#text=Next it was time to go through the security checkpoint and head to the terminal so I could get onto the airplane .
#text=There were no problems with security , so I headed to the terminal to wait for my flight to start letting people get on the plane .
#text=On the way I bought a magazine so I would have something to read .
#text=Once I found a seat in the terminal , I sat back and started to look through my magazine .
#text=After about 20 minutes the plane started loading .
#text=I got in line , showed my ticket and headed down the walkway into the plane .
#text=When I found my seat , I was happy to see it was by a window so I could look out as we went .
#text=It took about 15 minutes to get everyone settled in , then it was time to go .
#text=The flight attendant told us where the exits were , then we buckled our seatbelts and the plane started moving .
#text=The captain announced that the weather was good and we should have a great flight .
#text=Then he brought the engines up to full and we headed down the runway and lifted off into the sky .
#text=Once we could take our seatbelts off , I got a soda from the flight attendant and got my magazine out .
#text=Between reading and looking out the window at the clouds below us the flight went quickly .
#text=I did n't even finish reading before it was time to put our seatbelts back on and land .
#text=We all got off the plane and headed to the baggage claim area to get our suitcases .
#text=Mine came out pretty early , so I grabbed it and headed out of the airport .
#text=It was a great flight and I had a good time visiting my aunt .
